statements: SELECT * FROM shortest_path;
SELECT id, location_from, location_to FROM shortest_path;
SELECT location_from, location_to, distance FROM shortest_path;
SELECT * FROM shortest_path WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT location_from, location_to FROM shortest_path ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM shortest_path ORDER BY distance DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location_from, location_to FROM shortest_path WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC
SELECT id, location_from, location_to, distance FROM shortest_path WHERE location_from LIKE '%A%' AND location_to LIKE '%B%' ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT * FROM shortest_path WHERE location_from = 'New York' OR location_to = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT AVG(distance) AS average_distance, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM shortest_path
SELECT * FROM locations
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC
SELECT * FROM roads WHERE road_distance > 100 ORDER BY road_distance ASC
SELECT location_name, latitude FROM locations WHERE longitude < 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locations
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT * FROM roads WHERE road_distance BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY road_distance ASC
SELECT locations.location_name, roads.road_distance FROM locations INNER JOIN roads ON locations.location_id = roads.start_location_id
SELECT location_name AS Name, CONCAT('Lat:', latitude, ', Long:', longitude) AS Coordinates FROM locations
SELECT * FROM locations
SELECT location_name FROM locations ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT * FROM roads WHERE distance > 100
SELECT location_name, distance FROM locations INNER JOIN roads ON locations.location_id = roads.start_location_id
SELECT location_name FROM locations WHERE location_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT start_location_id, end_location_id, distance FROM roads ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM shortest_paths WHERE shortest_distance < 50;
SELECT location_name, shortest_distance FROM locations JOIN shortest_paths ON locations.location_id = shortest_paths.start_location_id;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roads ORDER BY road_length DESC;
SELECT start_location_id, end_location_id, road_length FROM roads WHERE road_length > 10;
SELECT route_id, shortest_path_description FROM route_plan WHERE start_location_id = 1 AND end_location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT start_location_id, end_location_id, road_length FROM roads WHERE road_length > 10 ORDER BY road_length ASC;
SELECT path_id, start_location_id, end_location_id, shortest_distance FROM paths WHERE shortest_distance < 100 ORDER BY shortest_distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location_id, end_location_id, shortest_path_description FROM route_plan WHERE route_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Locations LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM Locations WHERE location_name = 'City A';
SELECT * FROM Roads ORDER BY road_length DESC;
SELECT path_id, start_location_id, end_location_id, shortest_distance FROM Paths WHERE shortest_distance < 100;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM Users WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_name FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 'abc123';
SELECT route_plan_id, route_description FROM RoutePlans WHERE start_location_id = 'xyz321' AND end_location_id = 'def456';
SELECT road_length FROM Roads WHERE start_location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM Locations WHERE location_name = 'City A') ORDER BY road_length DESC;
SELECT user_name FROM Users WHERE user_id = '123456';
